name: Gelatin Run
description:
It's an office party celebrating the milestone of their first game release!  One poor gelatin desert doesn't want to be part of the celebration and attempts to hop away as far as it can.

Avoid falling obstacles of plates, coffee mugs, and staplers as the pace increases, and try to get the highest distance you can.

"A" or "LeftArrow" hops back, "D" or "RightArrow" hops forward, "Escape" to pause the game.

Made for the IGDA eJam 2020 in less than 48 hours. My first game jam.
Focused on challenging myself to learn scripting with this game and not worry about the art. It was a great experience and I definitely gained a lot of knowledge and understanding of scripting in Unity.
